sentences.en: At the concert, I was held in thrall by the music.
sentences.cn: 在音乐会上, 我被音乐迷住了.

sentences.en: But he still held the crowd in thrall as ever.
Everytime you create an alliance character, Thrall eats a kitten.
sentences.cn: 每当你创建一名联盟角色, 萨尔就要吃一只小猫.

sentences.en: Have fail in his career, he become a thrall to drug.
sentences.cn: 事业失败后, 他吸毒成瘾.

sentences.en: He is a thrall to drink.
He is not in thrall to the media.
Not his ascendency alone, however , held me in thrall at present.
sentences.cn: 目前束缚着我们,并不只是他的支配地位.

sentences.en: The country's economy is largely in thrall to the big companies.
sentences.cn: 该国的经济在很大程度上受制于大公司.

sentences.en: The story held me in thrall.
Thrall : Either of those caverns could stretch for miles.
sentences.cn: 萨尔: 两个方向的路都延伸好几英里.

sentences.en: Thrall: Hellscream is like a brother to me Cairne.
sentences.cn: 萨尔: 地狱咆哮就像是我的兄弟,凯恩.

sentences.en: Thrall: North? But there's an army of the horse men marching north.
sentences.cn: 萨尔: 北方? 可是正有一支人马部队在向北方进军.

sentences.en: Thrall: Thank you, Cairne. I will not forget you.
sentences.cn: 萨尔: 很感谢你, 凯恩. 你的恩情我终生难忘.

sentences.en: Tomorrow's children will be even more in the thrall of the silicon chip.
sentences.cn: 将来硅片对孩子们的影响将进一步加深。

sentences.en: We have a congress that is in thrall to special interest groups.
sentences.cn: 我们的国会受制于一些特殊利益集团。

trans.tran_cn: <文>奴隶，奴役，奴隶制，奴隶般受支配的人
trans.tran_en: If you say that someone is in thrall to a person or thing, you mean that they are completely in their power or are greatly influenced by them
